description: Master making onion rings from scratch with this easy recipe. They're oh-so crispy and are a go-to side for your favourite burger recipe.
keywords: Onion rings,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Halal,High fibre,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Jan Feb 2021,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Easy Onion Rings Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 brown onions, cut into thick rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Combine flour and paprika in a bowl. Season. Whisk in soda water until just combined. Heat vegetable oil (10cm deep) in a saucepan over high heat. Working in batches, dip onion in batter, then fry for 2 minutes or until crisp. Drain on paper towels.
